person.persName: John N. Pearman (Larue Co. KY, farmer and corporal 1st Ky Light Artiller)

body.p: Larue County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Henry County, Kentucky native. Son of Price Pearman and Elizabeth Pearman. Farmer in Larue County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in Larue County in 1860. Farmer in Larue County in 1863. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery (U.S.A.) as private and corporal from September 10, 1863, to July 26, 1865.
